title: Remember Sword of the Divine?
body:
Remember how it was removed because it was shit on most champions, but some could abuse the hell out of it?
{{champion:107}} {{champion:29}} 
...
Now let's take this item whose stats are worth double its cost {{item:3124}} 
...
Put it on most champions. For example:
{{champion:107}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:112}}
...
It's pretty shit.
...
Put it on a few select champions.
######{{champion:24}} {{champion:5}} maybe {{champion:11}} 
...
Now they're abusing the shit out of it. 
Hate when history repeats itself.
